name: weather-app--ash
description: A fun little project showcasing some skills
author: Craig Martin

scripts.demo: npm run setup && npm run demo-server
scripts.deployment: git checkout gh-pages && git fetch origin master && git reset --hard origin/master && npm run setup && rsync -var --delete-after weather-app--ash/ . && rm -rf Gruntfile.js README.md bower.json build.txt package.json .bowerrc .gitignore node_modules/ less/ test/ public/vendor/JSON-js/ public/vendor/backbone public/vendor/bootstrap/.bower.json public/vendor/bootstrap/Gruntfile.js public/vendor/bootstrap/LICENSE public/vendor/bootstrap/README.md public/vendor/bootstrap/bower.json public/vendor/bootstrap/fonts public/vendor/bootstrap/dist/css/ public/vendor/bootstrap/dist/js public/vendor/bootstrap/grunt public/vendor/bootstrap/js public/vendor/bootstrap/less/ public/vendor/bootstrap/package.js public/vendor/bootstrap/package.json public/vendor/d3 public/vendor/es5-shim public/vendor/handlebars public/vendor/jquery public/vendor/requirejs-text public/vendor/sinon-shai public/vendor/sinonjs public/vendor/underscore javascript/.jscsrc javascript/.jshintrc && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy app' && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.clean-built-dirs: rm -rf weather-app--birch && rm -rf css && rm -rf compiledES6
scripts.watch-es6: watchify -t babelify -t brfs -t browserify-shim javascript/main.js -o compiledES6/main.js -dv
scripts.build-es6: browserify -t babelify -t brfs -t browserify-shim javascript/main.js -dv | uglifyjs > compiledES6/main.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-es6 && npm run watch-less
scripts.build: npm run build-less && npm run build-es6
scripts.dist: npm run clean-built-dirs && npm run make-static-dirs && npm run build
scripts.setup-project: npm run clean-installed-dirs && npm install && bower install
scripts.setup: npm run setup-project && npm run dist
